resources.string: CREATE TABLE [FlashMessages] ( [FeedId] INT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, [Author] VARCHAR, [Content] VARCHAR, [GeneralTime] VARCHAR, [HeadImageUrl] VARCHAR, [ContentURI] VARCHAR, [IsShining] BOOLEAN DEFAULT false, [IsNewPerson] BOOLEAN DEFAULT false, [HasComment] BOOLEAN DEFAULT false, [MessageType] INT, [ParentFeedId] VARCHAR);
